title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
description: When adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, cancelling the process does not have any effect.
OB: Currently, when the user tries to add an exception breakpoint and cancels the process, the exception breakpoint is still added without any errors or warnings.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the user cancels the process of adding an exception breakpoint, no breakpoint is added and the user receives a confirmation message indicating the cancellation.
SR: 1) Open the debug perspective in the software2) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective3) Click the button to add an exception breakpoint4) In the progress dialog, click the "Cancel" button
